front.title: Proof of Process (PoP): Architecture, Evidence Format, and VDF

abstract.t: This document specifies the Proof of Process (PoP) protocol, a specialized profile of Remote Attestation Procedures (RATS) designed to validate digital authorship through a "provenance of effort." It defines the core architecture, the RATS role mappings, the normative CBOR-encoded Evidence Format (including EAT integration), and the Verifiable Delay Function (VDF) mechanisms used to prove temporal and physical creation constraints.
